query.q: eval(A/B, alias='usage', A="M::`kube_pod`:(avg(`cpu_usage_millicores`)) { `namespace` = '#{namespace}' and `pod_name` = '#{pod_name}' } BY `pod_name`, `namespace`, `node_name`", B="M::`kube_pod`:(avg(`cpu_limit_millicores`)) { `namespace` = '#{namespace}' and `pod_name` = '#{pod_name}' } BY `pod_name`, `namespace`, `node_name`")
